    static Recipe RecipeDAO.getRecipeByName​(java.lang.String rName)
    use recipe name to search for the specific recipe in the table.
    Methods in dao that return types with arguments of type Recipe
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeDAO.getAllRecipes()
    get all recipe in the table.
    static java.util.List<Recipe> RecipeDAO.getRecipesByName​(java.lang.String rName)
    use fuzzy search on the given name to get the target recipes.
    Methods in dao with parameters of type Recipe
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static int RecipeDAO.createNewRecipe​(Recipe newRecipe)
    create a new recipe record in the database with the given recipe object.
    static int RecipeDAO.deleteRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
    delete the recipe in the database with the given recipe id.
    static int RecipeDAO.setRecipeFavourited​(Recipe recipe)
    use the given id to set the recipe's isFavourited to 1(true)
    static int RecipeDAO.updateRecipe​(Recipe recipe)
    use the given id to update the recipe in the database with the given information in the object.
